WaniKani Kanji Map

Enter your WaniKani API v2 token:
NOTE: You need to have a premium account on WaniKani in order to use this map.

You can get your token by going to Menu > Settings > Account > Public API Key, then by copying + pasting the "API Version 2" token into the input field above. Then slam that "Map Me" button and watch the Kanji Map get filled out with the kanji you learned that are Guru or higher!

Hover your mouse over the map to zoom in and pan around!!

Out of the 3002 kanji on the map, WaniKani covers 2019 of them. That means that by the time you're Level 60, you'll know 67.3% of the kanji on the map.
